text: These are tables of congressional delegations from Idaho to the United States Senate and United States House of Representatives. The current dean of the Idaho delegation is Senator Mike Crapo, having served in the Senate since 1999 and in Congress since 1993. ==United States Senate== Class II senators Congress Class III senators George L.
